job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Description
Associate Technology and Innovation (ATI) is a Customer Service organization enabling Amazon to become Earth’s most customer-centric company by efficiently building services, products and programs that deliver exceptional customer and employee experiences anywhere at scale. As a Data Scientist on the ATI Science team, you will have the opportunity to build and deploy game changing data science and machine learning solutions that deliver exceptional Associate experiences.
Basic Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, Engineering or a related quantitative field with three years of working experience as a Data Scientist
Experience in SQL, R, Python, or another scripting language
Track record of diving into data to discover hidden patterns and of conducting error/deviation analysis.
Knowledge of various machine learning techniques and key parameters that affect their performance.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills for both technical and non-technical audiences.
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
Extensive knowledge and practical experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, statistics, NLP, deep learning
Preferred Qualifications
Master’s degree in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, Engineering or a related quantitative field
5+ years of experience in data science
Company
- Amazon.com Services LLC
Job ID: A1603329
